name: Fantasy Solitaire
description:
Play the best free Fantasy Klondike Solitaire (Patience Solitaire) on iPhone/iPad in wonderful and mysterious fantasy world.

Fantasy Solitaire is simple, pleasant and beautiful. Just start playing and immerse yourself into addictive world of Solitare!

Solitaire Features:

Immersive graphics
Track your High Score (points and time)
Timer. Compare previous records
User friendly
Nice sound effects
Completely free
